name: Change the Fromality
description:
Change the Fromality

Hello!

Are you tired of your life? Of everyday unfairness? Of bad luck? Maybe your crush doesn't like you back, or your favorite chips aren't on the market now, or you're destined to die? If that's true - this game provides a solution to all the problems.

Try killing God with girl named Camiel. 

Info

A short story-based game about adventures of Camiel and Alister. 

Trigger warnings

Blood
Suicide
Depression
Hanging
Child Abuse
Death
Religion
Terminal illness

Instructions

Arrows = Move
SPACE or ENTER or Z = Examine / Advance text
SHIFT = Run
F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen
ESC or X = Menu / Cancel
